reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique visual features (e.g., specific furniture, tiling, or window placement) to resolve ambiguities among similar room types. For the Living/Dining areas, descriptions were matched based on the specific perspective (e.g., focusing on the long layout in Image_3 vs. the dining area in Image_2/16). In the Master Bedrooms, Desc_10 ('收納到位') and Desc_11 ('家具配置完整') were assigned to the rooms featuring the large, dark wood wardrobe/desk unit (Image_10, Image_12). Image_13 (a view of the simpler master bedroom) and Image_11 (a narrow kitchen) were identified as the two redundant images, as all 14 descriptions were successfully mapped to the remaining 14 unique visual spaces. The three bathroom descriptions were matched to the three distinct bathroom images (Image_9 for light tiles, Image_7 and Image_14 for the two views of the dark-tiled, spacious bathrooms).

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing the sofa, TV wall with storage ('牆面收納'), and balcony access ('採光佳', '通風良好').
Wide shot of the combined L/D area ('大坪數公領域') showing the dining table in the foreground and the living room extending back, confirming '用餐區預留'.
Clear view of the long, narrow layout ('長形規劃') looking toward the entrance, with light primarily from the far end ('採光單面') and a visible '收納牆面'.
Independent kitchen with a large glass door/window structure, strongly supporting '採光通風佳' and '可規劃後陽台'. Features open shelving ('櫥櫃收納多').
Unfurnished, square secondary bedroom ('規矩房型') with dual windows (large and small) providing excellent light ('採光良好').
Unfurnished, square secondary bedroom ('房型方正') with dual windows, fitting the '牆面留白' and '採光佳' tags.
Spacious bathroom ('空間寬敞') with dark marble-look tiles and no dry/wet separation ('無乾濕分離').
Furnished master bedroom ('主臥尺度大') with a simple bed and side tables, confirming '部分家具附贈'.
Bathroom featuring light gray/taupe tiles, distinct from the darker bathrooms (Image_7, Image_14). Fits '無明顯乾濕分離'.
Master bedroom featuring a large, dark wood wardrobe/desk unit, strongly matching '收納到位' and '家具齊全'.
Second view of the highly furnished master bedroom (identical furniture to Image_10), confirming '家具配置完整' and '方正格局'.
Second view of the dark-tiled bathroom, emphasizing the '大面積磁磚牆面' and '空間寬裕'.
Close-up view of the living room, highlighting the TV wall storage ('收納櫃體齊全') and showing light concentrated at the balcony end ('採光集中前端').
Open L/D space ('大面積開放空間') where the dining table is clearly positioned in the foreground, confirming '餐廳位置固定'.
